description: Data models for employee management including capabilities, specializations, and employee-related data structures

components.EmployeeCapability: Employee specialization capability model defining service types employees can perform beyond basic nail services.

rules: Immutable capability model defining specialized service types employees can perform beyond basic mani-pedi services.
Standard capabilities list defining salon service specializations: gels, acrylics, dip powder, waxing, facials, massage, nail art.
Color-coded capability system with distinct hex colors for visual identification in scheduling and assignment interfaces.
Display name separation from internal name allowing user-friendly labels while maintaining consistent internal identifiers.
JSON serialization support for capability data persistence and API communication with proper fallback handling.
Business rule implementation: basic mani-pedi services excluded as all employees can perform these standard services.
Capability identification system using string IDs for consistent reference across scheduling and service assignment logic.
Professional capability categorization covering comprehensive salon service types from nail enhancements to spa services.
Extensible design pattern allowing addition of new capabilities without breaking existing functionality.
Color consistency supporting UI theming and visual capability identification throughout employee management interfaces.
